boardgame.name: Nautilus
boardgame.description: The players are building a research station at the bottom of the sea, trying to find Atlantis, recover sunken treasures, and extract raw materials. The board shows the sea floor as a grid with shades indicating the levels of depth._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each round consists of three phases :_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-expanding the station : extra research stations will be added, these give advantages depending on their type, cost to build depends on the underwater landscape on which they are placed. More stations in use of the same type give better advantages. They must be occupied by a scientist before any advantage can be enjoyed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-deploying scientists : players must pay to bring them into the game. They can be moved around to start using the research stations. Once deployed they remain at this station. When using a station built by another player there is a cost._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-exploration : Up to 3 submarines can be launched when certain requirements are met. These explore outside the base searching for scientific and financial treasures as well as trying to find remains of Atlantis. The amount of built research stations and deployment of scientists greatly aid in the performance of the submarines. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;All players have special goals, consisting of sea discoveries that provide more points when recovered._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when certain tiles or all of the Atlantis tiles are found, when nobody buys/builds anything to expand the base and when not a single sea discovery was recovered._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Points are scored for recovered Atlantis chips and sea discoveries. Discoveries corresponding to the player's special goals score more points. The total of the discoveries is multiplied by the points gained from the stations. Extra points are given for left over money._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2002 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Advanced Game Nominee
2003 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Still in shrinkwrap Will ship worldwide Ship to USA (insurance, can keep tracking, by vessel) Shipping cost : $20 Delivery Time : 20~60 days ship to other : i will provide shiping cost later See my sale list I will discount if you will buy several games *** You must pay 3.4% + $0.30 USD more If you want payments funded by Credit Card, Debit Card or Buyer Credit ****

This copy is in the original factory shrink wrap. The contents are unplayed. The box has numerous points of shelf-wear including rubbing and a lot of bumped coners. This is the sort of wear you might not notice when the game is sitting on your shelf, but is certainly visible under closer inspection. Essentially, this is a new game in a damaged box. The Shipping will be whatever it costs to get the game from me to you. Combined shipping is the same deal; i.e., whatever it costs to get the lot from me to you. I do not add handling charges or any extra costs above shipping. Insurance and insurance costs are at your discretion. Please supply city, state, zip or equivalent and country of destination for shipping quotes. Any taxes or fees charged by the country of destination are your responsibility. I will not alter shipping documents or make false statements of any kind to evade a destination country_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s taxes or duties. Please do not ask. I can ship via U.S. postal service (USPS) or United Parcel Service (UPS). I accept Paypal, money orders and personal checks. Money orders and checks need to be in U.S. funds drawn on a U.S. bank. Seller will ship to buyer upon notification of confirmed payment from PayPal or receipt of a USPS money order. The final cost will be the sale price of the item plus actual shipping costs. No handling costs will be added. The buyer must supply his or her mailing address prior to payment and a shipping quote will be provided with 2 or more options. Insurance is optional, however, if the buyer pays 50% of the cost of insurance the seller will pay the other 50%. Uninsured items ship at the buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s risk. All items ship boxed.

Excellent shape, laminated play aids included. Played once. Shipping quote is for USPS Priority with delivery confirmation. I combine shipping as well if you wanna go nuts! PayPal welcome if drawn from checking account, please.
